title: Failed to create dump file
body:
Whenever i get into a champion select or sometimes in queue this thing would popup and it would tell me "failed to create dump file" and then my lol would just freeze and i would have to restart it. And when this happens in my ranked champion select i would have to lose lp because i have this problem.

Please Help I dont want to face this :(((

replies.body:
This can sometimes happen when your connection fails and the game fails to gather logs from the crash. Have you had any other connection related issues lately? (lag spikes, packet loss etc)

First thing I would recommend would be to run through the [**Connection Troubleshooting Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and use custom games to check the fixes.

Past that, try running a **client repair** through settings (the gear icon top right) > Initiate Full Repair.

If that doesn't work try **reinstalling the game** with the [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends).

If that still doesn't fix your issue **submit a ticket** to [Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they should be able to help you further.
